select a.seq ,a.title ,a.content ,a.newspaper ,a.abroadNy ,a.event ,a.league ,a.reporter ,a.aDelNy ,a.createdAt ,a.modifiedAt ,u.email as email

select a.seq ,a.title ,a.content ,a.newspaper ,a.abroadNy ,a.event ,a.league ,a.reporter ,a.aDelNy ,a.createdAt ,a.modifiedAt ,u.email as email from article a inner join user u on u.seq = a.createdBy where 1=1 and a.seq = #{seq}
SELECT ccSeq , ifccName , codeGroup_ccgSeq as ccgSeq FROM article WHERE 1=1 AND ifccDelNy = 0 AND ifccUseNy = 1
